original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Zechariah, behold, they are written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel.
korean_text: 스가랴의 남은 사적은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되니라

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Zechariah
they are written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 이스라엘 왕들의 역대기략에 기록되어 있다
